General.Name: Aevis Victoria SA
General.Description: Aevis Victoria SA engages in healthcare, hospitality, lifestyle, and infrastructure sectors in Switzerland. The company operates through Hospitals, Hospitality, Real Estate, and Others segments. It also provides telemedicine, ambulance, and life sciences related services. In addition, the company engages in the patient hotel, radiology institute, pharmacy, ophthalmology, real estate management, stem cells, cosmetics, parking, cleaning services, and IT related services. The company is headquartered in Fribourg, Switzerland. Aevis Victoria SA is a subsidiary of M.R.S.I. Medical Research, Services and Investments S.A.

6.Name: Mr. Dino  Cauzza
6.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Swiss Medical Network
